translation: Just as a man casts off worn-out clothes and puts on new ones, so too the embodied Self casts off worn-out bodies and enters others that are new.
commentary: 2.22 Clothes clothes? Old worn out? such as as? Except having cast away? Navani new? takes takes? Man: man? Others others? And so? Bodies bodies? Except having cast away? Worn out wornout? Others others? Sanyati enters? Navani new? Dehi the embodied (one).No commentary.
